sentence.Network_en: SS General Jurgen Stroop watches his troops raze Warsaw's ghetto.
sentence.Network_cn: 党卫队将军杰尔根.斯特如普注视着被他的部下一位平地的华沙犹太人区.

sentence.Network_en: The owners intend to raze the hotel and erect an office building on the site.
sentence.Network_cn: 业主打算夷平酒店和竖立一座办公大楼在网站上.

sentence.Network_en: The conquerors tried to raze the very name of the peoples national hero from their memories.
sentence.Network_cn: 征服者妄图把人民的民族英雄的名字从他们的记忆中抹去.

now , fifty years later , Jesse studied Sampson Ridge , where bulldozers razed woods for another gated community .现在，五十年以后，杰希看到桑普森山脊那儿，推土机推倒了树木，正要建立另一个封闭社区。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'scratch, incise'): from Old French raser 'shave closely', from Latin ras- 'scraped', from the verb radere

encyclopedia.content: 影片资料 中文名称：摧毁 英文名称：Raze 导演： Josh C. Waller 编剧： Kenny Gage Louis Iacoviello 主演： 瑞秋·尼科尔斯 Rachel Nichols （Jamie ） 佐伊·贝尔 Zoe Bell （Sabrina ） Olivia Harewood （Rhona ） 影片类型： 动作 / 恐怖 国家/地区： 美国 对白语言： 英语 制作/发行 制作公司：Blueeyes Productions [冰岛] Farraday Films 环球影业 [美国] Working Title Films [英国] 发行公司：环球影业 [美国] (2012)

entry.tran: 把（建筑或城镇）夷为平地；彻底摧毁
entry.def: If buildings, villages or towns are razed or razed to the ground, they are completely destroyed.

example.ex: Dozens of villages have been razed...
example.tran: 几十个村庄被夷为平地。

example.ex: Towns such as Mittelwihr and Bennwihr were virtually razed to the ground.
example.tran: 如米特维尔和本维尔这样的城镇基本上被夷为平地。

means.word_mean: 1. tear down so as to make flat with the ground;

auth_sentence.content: Men raze villages and annihilate whole populations.
auth_sentence.res_content: Men raze villages and annihilate whole populations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Men raze villages and annihilate whole populations.

means.word_mean: 彻底摧毁;将… 夷为平地

sentences.en: Fire razed the building to the ground.

sentences.en: Many villages were razed to the ground.
